SS chuckles.

SS: Forget it.

He flies off.

OOC: I checked and found out LN owns him, now can
anyone post for him sinceLN hasn't shown up for a
while, or at least tell me where he is (I could just
have SS carry him over his shoulder to the Pack).

--- airly2000 <airly2000@...> wrote:
> Shivah/Kali::
> 
> "He serves to Infectrons..."said Shivah "accept or
> denight what???"
> 
> Kali left The forthress and walked towards her
> brother.
> 
> 
>

> > Shadow Star chuckled.
